definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random

sentences.english: It starts with that deep breath of confidence you take before the first step.
sentences.chinese: 千里之行，开始于迈出第一步前那口自信的深呼吸。

sentences.english: This reduces your confidence, making you more vulnerable to your fears.
sentences.chinese: 它会腐蚀掉你的自信，使你被恐惧打败。

sentences.english: Kim So-yeon is an actress who exudes both innocence and confidence.
sentences.chinese: 金素妍是一个即天真又自信的女演员。

sentences.english: That would be great for JVG. Boost of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，老范会自信满满。

sentences.english: As your sense of self-trust increases, so will your sense of self-confidence.
sentences.chinese: 当你不断地相信自己，你就会感到自信。

sentences.english: Ignorance and confidence can truly be a winning combination.
sentences.chinese: 无知和自信真的可以称为一个成功的组合。

sentences.english: The positive correlation between health physique for male college students and self-confidence is obvious.
sentences.chinese: 男生身体形态特征与自信子因素特征呈显著的正相关。

sentences.english: After tough training, I got rid of my self-abasement and became confident.
sentences.chinese: 经过艰苦的训练，使我增强了自信心，消除了自卑感。

sentences.english: I am from a well-cultivated family.
sentences.chinese: 我来自一个高知家庭，自小自信，乐观。

sentences.english: It shows them you aren’t afraid of saying what you feel like saying and it shows that you are confident.
sentences.chinese: 那样你会表现出心直口快和自信的魅力。

sentences.english: His voice was perfectly calm and confident.
sentences.chinese: 屠维岳鞠躬，非常镇定非常自信地回答。

sentences.english: Conforming also makes people feel better about themselves by bolstering self-confidence.
sentences.chinese: 随大流可以增加自信使人们自我感觉更好。

sentences.english: After a while Hem's and Haw's confidence grew into arrogance37.
sentences.chinese: 后来，哼哼和唧唧的自信开始变成狂妄。

sentences.english: Doing good deeds requires self-confidence, to dispel all doubts and fear.
sentences.chinese: 为善要有自信，才能发挥不畏惧的坚定力量。

sentences.english: Signing up with Ferrari meant rebuilding my self-confidence in my own potential.
sentences.chinese: 和法拉利签约意味着在我的潜能中重塑自信。
